msbt.message: Check out that tail! You can really tell how fast it was. Super cool!
Those antlers are amazing! Like, how'd it even lift its head with all that extra hardware?
Even as a fossil, this thing is scary! Can you imagine what it was like to see these flying around?
Whoa! This fossil is wicked imposing! No wonder they call 'em the strongest dinosaurs!
I'm digging those spiky plates. Can't imagine how it moved around with 'em though.
Wow! I bet with a neck like that, you could see for miles!
Mammoths weremammoth! And check out those tusks. Those are ferocious!
What a weird-looking critter! It's like something out of a bad sci-fi movie.
This one just kinda looks like a normal fish. What's the big deal?
Whoa! This thing's scary! One look and you just KNOW not to mess with it, !
This thing looks seriously rad, but I'm not even gonna TRY to pronounce its name.
This is a fossil? Huh! Had me fooled.
This little fella ran around with the dinosaurs? Now THAT takes guts!
Hey, you donated this fossil, right? That's pretty rockin' of you. Now everyone can see it, !
Now THIS is something It's like a mini history of evolution! Really cool, .
